dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Hssss... What mortals dare disturb the shadows where I dwell?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We seek to bring balance and harmony to this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Balance? Harmony? Fools speak of concepts they cannot comprehend.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your darkness will yield to the light of our cause.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The light you worship is but a fleeting spark in the vast darkness. Pathetic.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We will not falter in our mission. Prepare to face our resolve!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your resolve is as feeble as your light. I shall crush you without mercy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We understand your power. Let us work together against a greater threat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! You think me a fool to trust the likes of you? Begone before I decide to end you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We do not fear the shadows, for we carry the strength of unity and hope.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity and hope. Words that ring hollow in the darkness that consumes everything.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Our unity shall be our shield against your malevolence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogant insects! Unity or not, you shall all be crushed beneath my shadow.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps there is a way for us to understand each other. Will you listen?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Listen? To the prattle of insignificant beings? I have no interest in your meaningless words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your darkness may be deep, but so is our determination to bring forth the dawn.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Determination... A frail flame in the face of the abyss. Your words amuse me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We shall prove that even the darkest shadow must yield to the light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from such feeble creatures. Let us see how long your light lasts.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us stand together, shades of darkness and beams of light, in unity against the encroaching void.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity? Light and shadow do not mix, mortal. Keep your delusions to yourself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We come to understand the darkness that veils this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding? You know nothing of the true darkness that resides here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Our knowledge may lead us to a path of mutual benefit. Will you hear us out?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Benefit? What could pitiful creatures like you offer that would interest me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we may find a way to transcend the depths of shadow and light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Transcend? You speak as if you hold the key to realms beyond. A fantasy, nothing more.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us combine our strengths and unravel the mysteries that bind us in this eternal night.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strengths? Mysteries? Your attempts at grandeur are laughable. I have no time for such games.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The darkness may hide secrets that even you have not uncovered. Will you join our quest for knowledge?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Quest for knowledge? You speak as if knowledge alone can dispel the shadows around us.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Our thirst for understanding may unite us in ways we never thought possible.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity through understanding? A naive notion. The shadows hold no alliance with the light.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us delve into the unknown together, for truths lie in the heart of darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Truths? The only truth is the eternal darkness that engulfs us. Your optimism is misguided.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We bow to the shadows' might, acknowledging their place in the tapestry of existence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bow? Acknowledge? Your words lack substance, like whispers in the wind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Our humility is not a sign of weakness but of respect for the shadows' essence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? The shadows care not for your feeble attempts at humility. Your actions speak louder.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We tread carefully, mindful of the power that lies within the darkness we traverse.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mindful? Careful? Your caution will not save you from the abyss that awaits.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: May our actions speak louder than words, showing our reverence for the shadows' presence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Actions... Reverence... Meaningless gestures from insignificant beings.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: In the swirling shadows, we find solace and strength, embracing the mysteries they hold.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Solace? Strength? The shadows offer only emptiness and the chill of eternity.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: In unity with the shadows, we seek to understand the balance between light and dark.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity? Balance? You speak of ideals that have no place in the realm of shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us walk alongside the shadows, learning from the depths of their eternal wisdom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom? Shadows? Foolish mortal, you know nothing of the true depths within.
